data.title: Town of East Lyme CT
data.meta_description: Located on Long Island Sound, midway between New York and Boston, East Lyme is a coastal town enhanced by frontage along the Niantic River diversity of population and land uses. Pay taxes online, use GIS maps, find trash collection & meeting schedules. Learn about East Lyme and the villages of Niantic & Flanders.
data.text:
Latest News

Health & Safety Fair

Exciting Opportunity to Connect with Customers at the Town of East Lyme’s 2024 Health & Safety Fair! We are thrilled to announce the highly-anticipated return of the Health & Safety Fair on Wednesday, September 18, 2024 Rain Date: Wednesday, September 25, 2024), after a decade-long hiatus. This… Read more >

Route 161 (Flanders Road) to Close During the Nighttime Hours for Two Weeks

Please be advised that Route 161 (Flanders Road) will be closed to traffic in the immediate area under the existing bridge to place new structural steel for bridge construction. The Exit 74 northbound on-ramp will remain open during this time. The Exit 74 southbound off-ramp will also… Read more >

Route 161/Exit 74 Project Information

Notice to Local Businesses Please be advised that roadwork on Route 161 will occur between September 3 through November 30, 2024. Project activities will include full depth reconstruction from Industrial Park Road to King Arthur Road and then from Frontage Road to the entrance of Walgreens as… Read more >

Justice of the Peace Appointments (Unaffiliated and Minor Party Electors)

JUSTICE OF THE PEACE Interested East Lyme voters who would like to become a Justice of the Peace, and who are unaffiliated or minor party voters, may file their application at the East Lyme Town Clerk’s Office between August 1, 2024 and November 1, 2024. The term… Read more >

Transfer Station Hours Change

We hope you are enjoying your Summer. We have been in summer hours right now at the Town’s Transfer Station at 91 Roxbury Rd, but starting on Tuesday September 3, 2024, the hours at the Transfer Station will revert back to our regular hours of Tuesday thru… Read more >

Notice of Public Hearing – Fair Rent Commission Ordinance

TOWN OF EAST LYME BOARD OF SELECTMEN NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING REGARDING AN ORDINANCE ENTITLED “ORDINANCE ESTABLISHING A FAIR RENT COMMISSION” HYBRID MEETING NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN of a public hearing to be held by the East Lyme Board of Selectmen at 12:00 p.m. on Tuesday, August… Read more >

The Orchards Subdivision Water Main Flushing Week of 8/12/24

The East Lyme Water Department is flushing water mains in The Orchards subdivision the week of August 12, 2024 The annual practice of flushing hydrants plays a vital role in safeguarding water quality. This crucial process aims to eliminate legacy iron and manganese from water mains, preventing… Read more >

After School Open Center Lead

East Lyme Youth and Family Services is seeking a responsible, organized, and passionate individual. Under the general supervision of the Director of Youth and Family Services, this individual will supervise and interact with middle school aged students attending the program. See Job description and application form in… Read more >

Renter Assistance Scam

It has been reported that spam calls from a company called Community Action, claiming to be a “renters assistance” program have been received by residents in East Lyme and Niantic, asking to verify personal information to help with rent fees. They are NOT associated with the Renter’s… Read more >
